original_text: For I told him that I would judge his family forever because of the sin he knew about; his sons blasphemed God, and he failed to restrain them.
korean_text: 내가 그의 집을 영원토록 심판하겠다고 그에게 말한 것은 그가 아는 죄악 때문이니 이는 그가 자기의 아들들이 저주를 자청하되 금하지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: that I would judge his family forever
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그의 가문을 영원히 심판할 것이라고

sentences.original_text: because of the sin he knew about
and he failed to restrain them
